description: TiddlyWiki-based memory programme using advanced FSRS algorithm

~[match[Hard]then{$:/language/tidme/hard}] ~[match[Good]then{$:/language/tidme/good}] ~[match[Easy]then{$:/language/tidme/easy}] ~[match[Next]then{$:/language/tidme/next}] ~[{$:/language/tidme/startstudy}] }}}/> <$list filter="[!is[blank]]" > <$list filter="[match[Next]then[Easy]else!is[blank]]" variable="rating" > <$let card={{{ [jsonget[Rating],] :map[jsonextract[Cards],,[card]] }}} review_log={{{ [jsonget[Rating],] :map[jsonextract[Cards],,[review_log]] }}} > <$list filter="[jsonget[lapses]compare:number:gteq]" variable="ignore" > <> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-notify" $param="$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw/notify/leech" /> <$action-setmultiplefields $fields="[jsonindexes[]]" $values="[jsonindexes[]] :map[jsonget]" <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-close-tiddler" /> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler="$:/temp/tidme/study/input" />

<$action-setfield $tiddler={{{ [addprefix[$:/state/folded/]] }}} text={{{ [subfiltermatchthen[show]else[hide]] }}} /> <$action-navigate $to=<> $scroll="yes" /> <$reveal default=<> type="match" text="" > <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-confetti-launch" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-confetti-launch" originY=0.6 spread=70 delay=300 /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-confetti-launch" <$transclude tiddler={{!!popup}} mode="inline" />
<$list filter="[all[current]has[modal]]" variable="modal" > <$set name=disabled filter={{!!condition-disabled}} > <$button class="tc-btn-invisible $(buttonClasses)$" tooltip=<> aria-label=<> actions={{!!actions}} disabled=<> > <> <> <$transclude tiddler=<> field="text" /> <$action-sendmessage $message="tm-modal" $param={{!!modal}} deckTiddler=<>/> \end \define tidme-button-outer() <$wikify name="buttonClasses" text={{!!button-classes}} mode="inline" output="text" > <> \end <>"},"$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw/ui/ViewTemplate/deck":{"title":"$:/plugins/tidme/fsrs4tw/ui/ViewTemplate/deck","tags":"$:/tags/ViewTemplate","list-before":"$:/core/ui/ViewTemplate/body","code-body":"yes","text":"<$list filter="[tag[$:/tags/TidmeDeck]]" variable="deckTiddler" > <$reveal type="nomatch" stateTitle=<> text="hide" default="show" retain="yes" animate="yes" >

<$wikify name="deckCaption" text={{{ [get[caption]] ~[split[/]last[]] }}} mode="inline" output="text" > <>

<$text text={{{ [get[card]] }}} />

{{!!description}}
<$let filter_learn=`[subfilter{$(deckTiddler)$!!card}!subfilter{$(deckTiddler)$!!card_exclude}subfilter{$(deckTiddler)$!!state_learn}]` filter_due=`[subfilter{$(deckTiddler)$!!card}!subfilter{$(deckTiddler)$!!card_exclude}subfilter{$(deckTiddler)$!!state_due}]` filter_new=`[subfilter{$(deckTiddler)$!!card}!subfilter{$(deckTiddler)$!!card_exclude}subfilter{$(deckTiddler)$!!state_new}]` filter_unfold=`[subfilter{$(deckTiddler)$!!card_unfold}]` filter_random=`[subfilter] [subfilter] +[sortrandom[]]` due-new=`$(filter_learn)$ $(filter_due)$ $(filter_new)$` new-due=`$(filter_learn)$ $(filter_new)$ $(filter_due)$` random=`$(filter_learn)$ [subfilter]` filter_queue=`${ [get[order]match[new-due]then] [get[order]match[random]then] ~[] }$` >
Learn: <$count filter="[subfilter]"/> Due: <$count filter="[subfilter]"/> New: <$count filter="[subfilter]"/>
